net.grinder.communication
Interface MessageDispatchRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageDispatchSender
public interface MessageDispatchRegistry

Register of message handlers, keyed by message type.

The current implementation of this interface (MessageDispatchSender) does not interpret the message type polymorphically. That is, a message is only passed to a handler if the handler was registered for the message's class; messages registered for super classes are not invoked.

Author:
Philip Aston

addFallback

void addFallback(Sender messageHandler)
Register a message handler that is called if no other handler or responder is registered for the message type. There can be multiple such handlers.

Parameters:
messageHandler - The sender.
